h1.base: margin: 32px 0 0; font-size: 2em; letter-spacing: -0.03em; line-height: 1.5; text-align: center;
h1.content: font-weight: bold; color: #2d5a27; display: inline-block; padding: 8px 20px; border: 2px solid #2d5a27; border-radius: 8px;

h2.base: margin: 28px 0 0; font-size: 1.5em; letter-spacing: -0.02em; line-height: 1.5; border-bottom: 2px solid #4a7c42;
h2.content: font-weight: bold; color: #2d5a27; display: inline-block; background: #e8f5e0; padding: 4px 12px; border-radius: 4px 4px 0 0;

h3.content: font-weight: bold; color: #4a7c42; border-left: 4px solid #4a7c42; padding-left: 10px;

code.block: color: #333; background: #f1f8ed; border-radius: 8px; border: 1px solid #d4e8c8; box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(45,90,39,0.1); margin: 1.2em 0; padding: 1em 1em 1em;  font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6; white-space: pre-wrap;
code.inline: background: #f1f8ed; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; color: #2d5a27; font-size: 14px; border: 1px solid #d4e8c8;

styles.quote: border-left: 4px solid #4a7c42; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px 16px; background: #f1f8ed; margin: 0.8em 0; color: #2d5a27; font-style: italic; word-wrap: break-word;
styles.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; margin: 1em auto; display: block; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(45,90,39,0.15);
styles.link: color: #4a7c42; text-decoration: none; border-bottom: 1px dashed #4a7c42; transition: all 0.2s ease;

table.container: width: 100%; margin: 1em 0; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #d4e8c8;
table.header: background: #e8f5e0; font-weight: bold; color: #2d5a27; border-bottom: 2px solid #4a7c42; font-size: 1em;
